verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are those whose <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H8549>blameless,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> according to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are those who <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H5713>statutes,<s%> who <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with their whole <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H6466>Yes,<s%> they do nothing <S%H5766>wrong.<s%> They <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
You have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> that we should <S%H3966>fully<s%> obey <S%H8104>them.<s%>
Oh <S%H305>that<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> were <S%H3559>steadfast<s%> to <S%H8104>obey<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes!<s%>
Then I <S%H954>wouldn't<s%> be disappointed, when I <S%H5027>consider<s%> all of your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to you with <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> when I <S%H3925>learn<s%> your <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
I will <S%H8104>observe<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%> <S%H3966>Don't<s%> utterly forsake <S%H5800>me.<s%> BET
How can a young <S%H5288>man<s%> keep his <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H2135>pure?<s%> By <S%H8104>living<s%> according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
With my whole <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> <S%H7686>you.<s%> Don't let me wander from your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
I have <S%H6845>hidden<s%> your <S%H565>word<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that I might not sin against <S%H2398>you.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> are <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh. <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
With my <S%H8193>lips,<s%> I have <S%H5608>declared<s%> all the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I have <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> as much as <S%H5921>in<s%> all <S%H1952>riches.<s%>
I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on your <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> and <S%H5027>consider<s%> your <S%H734>ways.<s%>
I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in your <S%H2708>statutes.<s%> I will not <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H1697>word.<s%> GIMEL
Do <S%H1580>good<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%> I will <S%H2421>live<s%> and I will <S%H8104>obey<s%> your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H1540>Open<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that I may <S%H5027>see<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%> out of your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5641>Don't<s%> hide your commandments from <S%H4687>me.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H1638>consumed<s%> with <S%H8375>longing<s%> for your <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> at all <S%H6256>times.<s%>
You have <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> who are <S%H779>cursed,<s%> who <S%H7686>wander<s%> from your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
<S%H1556>Take<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H937>contempt<s%> away from <S%H5341>me,<s%> for I have kept your <S%H5713>statutes.<s%>
Though <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>slander<s%> <S%H5650>me,<s%> your servant will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Indeed your <S%H5713>statutes<s%> are my <S%H8191>delight,<s%> and my <S%H582>counselors.<s%> DALED
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H1692>laid<s%> low in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> <S%H2421>Revive<s%> me according to your <S%H1697>word!<s%>
I <S%H5608>declared<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and you <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3925>me.<s%> Teach me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Let me <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1870>teaching<s%> of your <S%H6490>precepts!<s%> Then I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on your wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H1811>weary<s%> with <S%H8424>sorrow:<s%> <S%H6965>strengthen<s%> me according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H5493>Keep<s%> me from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8267>deceit.<s%> Grant me your <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H2603>graciously!<s%>
I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H530>truth.<s%> I have <S%H7737>set<s%> your ordinances before <S%H4941>me.<s%>
I <S%H1692>cling<s%> to your <S%H5715>statutes,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H954>Don't<s%> let me be disappointed.
I <S%H7323>run<s%> in the <S%H1870>path<s%> of your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> for you have set my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7337>free.<s%> HEY
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%> I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> them to the <S%H6118>end.<s%>
Give me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H8451>law.<s%> <S%H8104>Yes,<s%> I will obey it with my whole <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H1869>Direct<s%> me in the <S%H5410>path<s%> of your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> for I delight in <S%H2654>them.<s%>
<S%H5186>Turn<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> toward your <S%H5715>statutes,<s%> not toward selfish <S%H1215>gain.<s%>
Turn my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> from <S%H7200>looking<s%> at <S%H7723>worthless<s%> <S%H2421>things.<s%> Revive me in your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H6965>Fulfill<s%> your <S%H565>promise<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that you may be <S%H3374>feared.<s%>
Take <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> that I <S%H3025>dread,<s%> for your <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> are <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H8373>Behold,<s%> I long for your <S%H6490>precepts!<s%> <S%H2421>Revive<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%> WAW
Let your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> also <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, your <S%H8668>salvation,<s%> according to your <S%H565>word.<s%>
So I will <S%H1697>have<s%> an <S%H6030>answer<s%> for him who <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> <S%H982>me,<s%> for I trust in your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H5337>Don't<s%> snatch the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H3966>out<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> for I put my <S%H3176>hope<s%> in your <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
So I will <S%H8104>obey<s%> your <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H7342>liberty,<s%> for I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I will also <S%H1696>speak<s%> of your <S%H5713>statutes<s%> before <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and will not be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>
I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> because I love <S%H157>them.<s%>
I <S%H5375>reach<s%> out my <S%H3709>hands<s%> for your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> which I <S%H157>love.<s%> I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%> ZAYIN
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> your <S%H1697>word<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> because you gave me <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
This is my <S%H5165>comfort<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> for your <S%H565>word<s%> has revived <S%H2421>me.<s%>
The <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> <S%H3887>mock<s%> me <S%H3966>excessively,<s%> but I <S%H5186>don't<s%> swerve from your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have comforted <S%H5162>myself.<s%>
<S%H2152>Indignation<s%> has taken <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H7563>me,<s%> because of the wicked who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
Your <S%H2706>statutes<s%> have been my <S%H2158>songs,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> where I <S%H4033>live.<s%>
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and I <S%H8104>obey<s%> your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
This is my <S%H5341>way,<s%> that I keep your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%> CHET
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is my <S%H2506>portion.<s%> I <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H8104>obey<s%> your <S%H1697>words.<s%>
I <S%H2470>sought<s%> your <S%H6440>favor<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart.<s%> Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me according to your <S%H565>word.<s%>
I <S%H2803>considered<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H7272>steps<s%> to your <S%H5713>statutes.<s%>
I will <S%H2363>hurry,<s%> and not <S%H4102>delay,<s%> to <S%H8104>obey<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
The <S%H2256>ropes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5749>bind<s%> <S%H7911>me,<s%> but I won't forget your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
At <S%H2676>midnight<s%> I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H6664>you,<s%> because of your righteous <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
I am a <S%H2270>friend<s%> of all those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> of those who observe your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%> TET
<S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> according to your <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2940>judgment<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> for I <S%H539>believe<s%> in your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
Before I was <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> I went <S%H7683>astray;<s%> but now I <S%H8104>observe<s%> your <S%H565>word.<s%>
You are <S%H2896>good,<s%> and do <S%H2895>good.<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H2950>smeared<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> upon <S%H3820>me.<s%> With my whole heart, I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H2954>callous<s%> as the <S%H2954>fat,<s%> but I <S%H8173>delight<s%> in your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me that I have been <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> to me than <S%H505>thousands<s%> of pieces of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver.<s%> YUD
Your <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> me and <S%H3559>formed<s%> <S%H995>me.<s%> Give me understanding, that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
Those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> me and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> because I have put my <S%H3176>hope<s%> in your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H6664>righteous,<s%> that in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> you have afflicted <S%H6031>me.<s%>
Please let your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> be for my <S%H5162>comfort,<s%> according to your <S%H565>word<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
Let your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2421>me,<s%> that I may live; for your <S%H8451>law<s%> is my <S%H8191>delight.<s%>
Let the <S%H2086>proud<s%> be <S%H954>disappointed,<s%> for they have <S%H5791>overthrown<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully.<s%> I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> on your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Let those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H3045>me.<s%> They will know your <S%H5713>statutes.<s%>
Let my <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H8549>blameless<s%> toward your <S%H2706>decrees,<s%> that I may not be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%> KAF
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3615>faints<s%> for your <S%H8668>salvation.<s%> I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> for your <S%H565>word.<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> "When will you comfort <S%H5162>me?<s%>"
For I have become like a <S%H4997>wineskin<s%> in the <S%H7008>smoke.<s%> I <S%H7911>don't<s%> forget your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
How many are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant?<s%> When will you <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on those who persecute <S%H7291>me?<s%>
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H3738>dug<s%> <S%H7882>pits<s%> for <S%H8451>me,<s%> contrary to your law.
All of your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> are <S%H530>faithful.<s%> They <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully.<s%> Help <S%H5826>me!<s%>
They had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H3615>wiped<s%> me from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> but I <S%H5800>didn't<s%> forsake your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Preserve my <S%H2421>life<s%> according to your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> so I will <S%H8104>obey<s%> the <S%H5715>statutes<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> LAMED
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H5324>settled<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> You have <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H5975>remains.<s%>
Your <S%H4941>laws<s%> <S%H5975>remain<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> for all things serve <S%H5650>you.<s%>
<S%H3884>Unless<s%> your <S%H8451>law<s%> had been my <S%H8191>delight,<s%> I would have <S%H6>perished<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>
I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> for with <S%H2421>them,<s%> you have revived me.
I am <S%H3467>yours.<s%> Save <S%H1875>me,<s%> for I have sought your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H6>me,<s%> to destroy <S%H995>me.<s%> I will consider your <S%H5713>statutes.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H7093>limit<s%> to all <S%H8502>perfection,<s%> but your <S%H4687>commands<s%> are <S%H7342>boundless.<s%> <S%H3966><s%> MEM
How <S%H157>I<s%> love your <S%H8451>law!<s%> It is my <S%H7881>meditation<s%> all <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> make me <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> for your commandments are always with <S%H5769>me.<s%>
I have more <S%H7919>understanding<s%> than all my <S%H3925>teachers,<s%> for your <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> are my <S%H7881>meditation.<s%>
I <S%H995>understand<s%> more than the <S%H2205>aged,<s%> because I have <S%H5341>kept<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I have <S%H3607>kept<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from every <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H734>way,<s%> that I might <S%H8104>observe<s%> your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I have not <S%H5493>turned<s%> aside from your <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> for you have taught <S%H3384>me.<s%>
How <S%H4452>sweet<s%> are your <S%H565>promises<s%> to my <S%H2441>taste,<s%> more than <S%H1706>honey<s%> to my <S%H6310>mouth!<s%>
Through your <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> I get <S%H995>understanding;<s%> therefore I <S%H8130>hate<s%> every <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H734>way.<s%> NUN
Your <S%H1697>word<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> to my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and a <S%H216>light<s%> for my <S%H5410>path.<s%>
I have <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> and have <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> <S%H8104>it,<s%> that I will obey your <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
I am <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> very <S%H3966>much.<s%> <S%H2421>Revive<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H7521>Accept,<s%> I beg <S%H5071>you,<s%> the willing offerings of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me your <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand,<s%> yet I <S%H7911>won't<s%> forget your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H5414>laid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for <S%H8582>me,<s%> yet I haven't gone astray from your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I have taken your <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> as a <S%H5157>heritage<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> for they are the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
I have <S%H5186>set<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> even to the <S%H6118>end.<s%> SAMEKH
